alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Indiana; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL INDIANA...WESTMORELAND...SOUTHERN ARMSTRONG AND NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 351 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Indiana, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Indiana, Latrobe, Vandergrift, Kittanning, Homer City, Apollo, Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Blairsville, and Youngwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
